structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Records and forms covering involuntary hospitalization procedures.
law.text: The secretary of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services may prescribe appropriate records to be maintained covering the operations of the cabinet and of the institutions operated by it, and covering involuntary hospitalization procedures. Any record forms applicable to involuntary hospitalization procedures shall be furnished to each court having jurisdiction to order hospitalization of mentally ill persons or individuals with an intellectual disability, and the records contemplated by such forms shall thereafter be made by the hospitalizing courts.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 73, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 316, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 261, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1) and (8). -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 54. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 22.
